name: 陳人壽
objective:
本課程藉由家具設計專案，讓學生實際演練家具設計程序及創新方法。本課程同時配合家具材料、家具結構與實習、家具製圖、電腦輔助家具設計等課程，期能習得家具創新設計與產品工程的能力。
The course of furniture design project let students practice the design procedure and innovative methodology. The course integrate the other courses: furniture construction and practice, furniture drawing, CAD furniture design etc, expect getting the capability of innovative design and product engineering.

name: 劉英彥
objective:
本課程讓學生實際演練家具設計程序及創新方法，配合家具材料、家具結構與實習、家具製圖、電腦輔助家具設計等課程，以習得家具創新設計與產品工程的能力。

The program allows students to practice furniture design procedures and innovative methods, cooperate with furniture materials, furniture structure and practice, furniture drawing, computer-aided furniture design and other courses to achieve the ability of furniture innovation design and engineering.
